intro: Seseli rimosum, commonly known as the slender seseli, is a herbaceous plant belonging to the Apiaceae family. It is characterized by its slender, branched stems and small, greenish-white flowers that bloom in umbels. The plant typically grows in moist, calcareous soils and is often found in meadows and along stream banks. Its leaves are finely divided and can be somewhat aromatic, similar to other members of its family. Seseli rimosum is relatively uncommon and is considered a rare plant in parts of Europe.
